Translations.Text: innema kane kavle-lmu'minine iza du`u ile-llahi verasulihi liyahkume beynehum ey yekulu semi`na veeta`na. veulaike humu-lmuflihun
vemey yuti`i-llahe verasulehu veyahse-llahe veyettakhi feulaike humu-lfaizun
veaksemu billahi cehde eymanihim lein emertehum leyahrucunn. kul la tuksimu. ta`atum ma`rufeh. inne-llahe habirum bima ta`melun
kul eti`u-llahe veeti`u-rrasul. fein tevellev feinnema `aleyhi ma hummile ve`aleykum ma hummiltum. vein tuti`uhu tehtedu. vema `ale-rrasuli ille-lbelagu-lmubin

la tahsebenne-llezine keferu mu`cizine fi-l'ard. veme'vahumu-nnar. velebi'se-lmesir
